sn44.3:1.1: At one time Venerable Sāriputta and Venerable Mahākoṭṭhita were staying near Benares, in the deer park at Isipatana.
sn44.3:1.2: Then in the late afternoon, Venerable Mahākoṭṭhita came out of retreat, went to Venerable Sāriputta, and exchanged greetings with him.
sn44.3:1.3: When the greetings and polite conversation were over, he sat down to one side, and said to Sāriputta:
sn44.3:2.1: “Reverend Sāriputta, does a Realized One exist after death?”
sn44.3:2.2: “Reverend, this has not been declared by the Buddha.”
sn44.3:2.4: “Well then, does a Realized One not exist after death? …
sn44.3:2.7: Does a Realized One both exist and not exist after death? …
sn44.3:2.10: Does a Realized One neither exist nor not exist after death?”
sn44.3:2.11: “This too has not been declared by the Buddha.”
sn44.3:3.1: “Reverend, when asked these questions, you say that they have not been declared by the Buddha.
sn44.3:3.6: What’s the cause, what’s the reason why they have not been declared by the Buddha?”
sn44.3:4.1: “Reverend, ‘does a Realized One exist after death?’ is included in form.
sn44.3:4.2: ‘Does a Realized One not exist after death?’ is included in form.
sn44.3:4.3: ‘Does a Realized One both exist and not exist after death?’ is included in form.
sn44.3:4.4: ‘Does a Realized One neither exist nor not exist after death?’ is included in form.
sn44.3:4.5: ‘Does a Realized One exist after death?’ is included in feeling …
sn44.3:4.18: ‘Does a Realized One not exist after death?’ is included in consciousness.
sn44.3:4.19: ‘Does a Realized One both exist and not exist after death?’ is included in consciousness.
sn44.3:4.20: ‘Does a Realized One neither exist nor not exist after death?’ is included in consciousness.
sn44.3:4.21: This is the cause, this is the reason why this has not been declared by the Buddha.”
